text: Golden Sands () is a 1984 Icelandic comedy movie directed by Ágúst Guðmundsson and starring Arnar Jónsson, Edda Björgvinsdóttir, Pálmi Gestsson. == Other websites == * Category:1984 comedy movies Category:Icelandic movies Category:Movies directed by Ágúst Guðmundsson
title: Golden Sands (movie)
